title: US-Israel attack Iran: Saudi capital Riyadh becomes evacuation hub for wealthy individuals
summary_full: Riyadh has become a crucial evacuation hub for wealthy individuals and executives as missile and drone attacks disrupt previously secure Gulf cities. With limited alternatives, the Saudi capital's open airspace and operating airport offer the most viable departure point for those seeking to leave the region.
